Key:
(What is this... I feel really nostalgic. Oh that's right.
I've seen this... before...)
The most important thing... Where is it...?
(Huh? The most important thing?)
Would I know... when I meet them?
(Meet them... You're―)
WAKE UP! Onii-chan, rise and shine!
...Hurghk―?!

(Kotori's foot hit me square in the gut, and I had no
choice but to roll over in my bed.)

Ahahaha! You hear that? What a funny sound. He's
on all fours now!

K-Kotori... What the heck... There are some things...
you should do, and some things you shouldn't do...
Hahaha. My bad, Onii-chan.
How can you be so casual about this?! ...Ow...

It's your fault for not waking up on time. Come on!
Breakfast, breakfast!
...Oh, that's right. Sorry, let me get it ready now...
(Kotori must be hungry. I have to hurry.)

Hm? You don't need to get it ready. I mean, it's
already ready.
Huh? Already ready?

Yeah. It was done a long time ago! Come on dearie,
be a lamb and get ready in... 40 seconds!
What kind of grandma are you...

(Wait a minute. Are you going to tell me Kotori made
breakfast? What is going on here?)
Well, I guess I'll start by changing...

(My little sister worked hard. I can't let the food go
cold.)

Gosh, Onii-chan. I said 40 seconds... *nom, nom*...
I'm already eating... *nom*.

Your mouth's full of food, dear sister. It isn't good
manners, so don't eat and talk at the same time.

Good morning, Shido. I made toast, ham and eggs,
and a salad for breakfast.

Good morning, Maria. Ah, so you made breakfast today,
huh? I knew it. I mean Kotori is the designated eater.
*Nom, nom*... How rude, Nom-chan.
(Who is that...)
I wish I coulda helped you.

It's fine. This isn't a big deal. Shido, you're like the
master of the house. Be bold from time to time and
relish in doing nothing.
Haha... Thanks, Maria.

You're welcome. It's touching to hear you say that
much. Now Shido, please sit.
Sure.

(I sat down, but it felt a little strange to see Maria
standing in the kitchen.)
Hm? Is something the matter, Shido?
Oh... Nothing.

(That's right. Maria is often here in the kitchen, so it's
not exactly an unusual scene.)

(She served me breakfast while I was seated. The
salad was full of vegetables in vibrant colors. There
was even a bit of cereal in it, too.)

Whoa. It looks so delicious. The dressing... Was this
made from scratch?

Yes, I made it myself. I'm sure you'll love it. Please
help yourself.

(Maria's homemade dressing tasted as though she used
onion paste as a base. I think she cooked it so it
wouldn't be too bitter, just very mild and sweet.)
(I bit into a piece of toast.)

(Mmm, delicious. It's so nice with a lot of butter on
the toast.)

Delicious... This is delicious, Maria! You've long
since surpassed me.

Do you think so? I don't know myself. But if that is
true, then I've finally obtained the right to marry
you, Shido. Is that what this means?
M-M-M-Marry?!

Oh, that's right. You've always said that, huh? That
because you can cook yourself, you don't need a wife.
That has nothing to do with this!
Hehe... That's unfortunate.
You guys...

(But seriously, Maria's definitely improved. She's
cooked for us before, but... why does it feel like I
haven't eaten it in a while?)

...You look like there's something on your mind. Is
something the matter?
Oh... Nothing. I was just thinking about something.
Thinking. Um... Shido, could it be...
Huh?

Gosh. It's rude to be lost in thought while eating,
Onii-chan.
R-Right... Sorry. Let's hurry up and eat.

(It seemed like Maria had something to say, but... I
wonder what it was. Well, I guess I can ask her after
I send Kotori off.)

Well, I'll be on my way then! You're still going to be
here for a bit, right?

...Yeah. I'll leave after I clean up with Maria. I
still have some time.
Mm. Got it. Later!
Later, Kotori.
Be careful, okay?!
Got it!

...Maria, weren't you in the middle of saying
something earlier?
Shido, do you not question why I'm here?
Question why you're here?

(Why would I question why she's here? Maria's
always been here... Wait.)

Do you remember when the last time was that I spoke
to you?
Oh yeah, huh... Uh...

(That's right. I just spoke to Maria the other day. I
met her in the virtual world and we spent time
together...)
In the end you got in my cell...!

So I was right. You remember. The real time you spent
with me.

Yeah, I was a little confused a while ago, but I
remember now. You and Marina. How I met you two
in the virtual world. Of course I wouldn't forget.
I see. Then clearly we are in some abnormal condition.
Abnormal...?

...Yes. This world has been altered somehow. I don't
even know if this is reality.
Not reality? That's crazy...
(But thanks to Marina, Maria was able to come ba―)

Shido, have you forgotten? I'm the management AI of
the Fraxinus. I'm normally an existence comprised of
just data. However, I am here...

I see! The only way I can communicate with you is in
the virtual world... Why didn't I realize this?

(That's right. Maria's physical body only exists in that
virtual reality.)
Then does that mean we're in virtual reality again?

No, that is not the case. Due to the damage the
Fraxinus had sustained, My Little Shido 2" has
Then this isn't virtual reality... but reality?

You see, just earlier I asked Kotori if she felt that
it was odd to see me here, but Kotori answered quite
naturally that I've been living here since last week.
And that's when you realized this was odd...

Exactly. I don't know how or why, but it's clear that
everyone else besides you and me had their memories
altered somehow. It may be an attack of some kind.

Altering memories... Maybe in the virtual world, but
is that possible in reality...?

Well the powers of Spirits and the technology that
follows it can be pretty mysterious. So I cannot say
with certainty that it is impossible.

...You have a point. Kotori being like that too must
mean that everyone in Ratatoskr must be in the same
situation inside the Fraxinus.

I cannot confirm it, but we can assume so. Even you,
with your Spirit powers, seem to be affected slightly.
However, it seems I've not been affected at all...
Is it because you're AI?
I assume. Of course, this is all speculation.
I see...

In my memory, it felt like this world suddenly
appeared. If you have memories from before, can
you tell me what life was like then?

Uh... I wonder what I was doing... Someone asked me
to look for something...

(No matter how hard I thought, it felt like there was
a haze in my brain that kept me from remembering.)
Sorry, I can't really remember.

I suppose it's not that easy. There are currently too
many unknowns. I think we should continue to observe
for a little while longer.

R-Right... Let's do that. I'll try my best to remember,
too.
Hehe... I'll be counting on you.

But I don't think we should act too suspicious. If we
take into consideration the person who made this
happen...

(The person who made this happen... Could it be a
Spirit or DEM?)

Got it. I'll be careful. Maria, you be careful too,
all right?
...Of course. I am your Maria.
Y-You can't say that in front of people, okay?!
Why not? Do you have something to hide?

Well um... I guess you'll give off the wrong
impression.
Hehe... I know. That was my way of joking.

*Sigh*... I'm sweating buckets here. Anyways, Maria.
Why are you dressed in our school uniform?
Don't tell me... you just noticed?
Oh well... um... sorry.

(Crap... Did I upset Maria? Um, at a time like this,
I―)
Looks good on you.
Does that mean we get to go to school together?

Well... I know it may be late, but you look really
good in our uniform, Maria.
...?! Really?
Yeah, of course. It's very refreshing.
I see. Thank you.
You weren't wearing a uniform in the virtual world.

Yes. I didn't think I needed to. But now I'm happy I
got to wear it.

Haha, nice. I'm glad we get to be here together,
Maria.
Shido, it's terrible how good you are with women.
What?! Did I say something really messed up?

No. But I'd recommend that you not say things that
would give the wrong impression.
*Grunt*... I didn't mean it that way.
Then you must study more, shouldn't you?
You are absolutely right.

Ah... If you're in a uniform, then that means you get
to go to school with us?

That seems to be the case. Since last week, I've been
a pretty girl homestaying at the Itsuka residence.
I see... Wait, homestay? So you're living here?!
Yes. That's what we did before, so it makes sense.

Well, I guess you have a point... But you're going to
call yourself a pretty girl...
Is there a problem with that?
Not at all.
(I mean it's true. She is pretty...)
...So what about Tohka and the others?

I believe they're at the mansion... but since it's
different from virtual reality, I can't speak for Kurumi
and Miku.
You don't know, Maria?

I do not have the access right to the Fraxinus or
this world. I suppose to a certain extent, I'm simply
human.

Then I can't be depending on you all the time then,
huh? I have to take action too.

Yes. I will keep you apprised of any updates as
they are confirmed.

But perhaps we've spoken too much. Even if we wish
to clarify the situation, it would be best that we
hurry and go to school.

You're right. Let's hurry and clean this up. We'll
go together, Maria.
Okay!
